docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Oct. 28.--A general strike called this afternoon by the Workmen's Federation in protest against the conviction of Nicolo Sacco and Bartolomeo Vanzetti of murder in Massachusetts met with considerable response.
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Oct. 28.--A general strike called this afternoon by the Workmen's Federation in protest against the conviction of Nicolo Sacco and Bartolomeo Vanzetti of murder in Massachusetts met with considerable response.
docs.abstract: Buenos Aires police refuse to permit meeting of protest on behalf of Sacco and Vanzetti

headline.main: STRIKE IN MONTEVIDEO ON VERDICTS HERE; Troops Massed During Protest Over Sacco and Vanzetti-- Argentine Reds Appeal.

docs.snippet: PARIS, Oct. 30.--With mass in the morning in their new church, with a banquet for every man, woman and child in their new hall, with a procession through every street and past every house and, lastly, with dancing and merrymaking, the 552 inhabitants...
docs.lead_paragraph: PARIS, Oct. 30.--With mass in the morning in their new church, with a banquet for every man, woman and child in their new hall, with a procession through every street and past every house and, lastly, with dancing and merrymaking, the 552 inhabitants of Ancerviller le Neuf today celebrated the complete restoration of their village.
docs.abstract: village of Ancerviller le Neuf celebrates rebuilding

headline.main: RISEN ON WAR RUINS, FRENCH TOWN IS GAY; Ancerviller le Neuf Celebrates Completion of Rebuilding of the Entire Village.

headline.main: FOREIGN EXCHANGE; German Mark Goes to New Low Level--Sterling and Continentals Up.

docs.snippet: With the pressure against the German mark continuing unabated, the selling running to a larger total yesterday than on earlier days of the week, Berlin remittances again went into record low ground at 43-100 of a cent. Reports of sales under this...
docs.lead_paragraph: With the pressure against the German mark continuing unabated, the selling running to a larger total yesterday than on earlier days of the week, Berlin remittances again went into record low ground at 43-100 of a cent. docs.snippet: Transactions in the foreign exchanges were on the usual small scale for a Saturday, with the changes about evenly divided between advances and declines.
